TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter extends System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter

remarks.format:
## Remarks This class is used to verify a digital signature made with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA> algorithm.
Use <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter> to create digital signatures with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA> algorithm.
## Examples The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A> method to verify a signature.
[!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeFormatterExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.security.cryptography.rsapkcs1signaturedeformatterexample/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeFormatterExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.security.cryptography.rsapkcs1signaturedeformatterexample/vb/program.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool VerifySignature (byte[] rgbHash, byte[] rgbSignature);

Docs.param: The signature to be verified for rgbHash.
Docs.summary: Verifies the PKCS#1 signature for the specified data.
Docs.returns: if matches the signature computed using the specified hash algorithm and key on ; otherwise, .

remarks.format:
## Remarks You must specify a key and a hash algorithm before calling this method.
## Examples The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A> method to verify a signature.
